name: Crab Dungeon
description:
Story:

There is an infestation of Crabs in the Lich's Dungeon. The Lich has gone on vacation and hired you to take care of their Crab problem. He has a massive Crab allergy, so it's utterly important that you complete your task!

Catch the crabs with your Net and Win :,)

Controls:

  • W - Move Forward
  • A - Turn Left
  • D - Turn Right
  • Q - Shaft Left
  • E - Shaft Right
  • Left Shift + W - Move further Forward 
  • Click Crabs to Catch them
